title: Heart-shaped hole in snow
prompt: Keep the faces in the reference image. A smiling young couple looks down through a heart-shaped hole carved in fresh snow, wearing warm winter clothing. This romantic portrait captures a joyful moment outdoors, perfect for winter-themed content and celebrating love.

title: Couple Making Snow Angels in Heart
prompt: Keep the faces in the reference image. An overhead shot captures a happy couple lying in fresh white snow, creating snow angels within a large heart shape carved into the snow. The man, wearing a red jacket, and the woman, in a beige coat, smile up at the camera, their joined hands at the bottom of the heart, symbolizing winter romance and shared joy.
